content.title: Why BestPOS?
content.content: We understand how difficult it can be to find the best POS system and merchant services for your business. Our POS experts are not your typical marketers but are real people who offer real recommendations.

content.title: Our Mission Statement
content.content: We have been in the industry for over 20 years and understand what products and services can help a new or existing business succeed. Our mission is to provide the most up-to-date product information and unbiased reviews to assist merchants in making wise and informed decisions. Our ultimate goal is to provide you with free content and services to help you find the best solution for your business.

content.title: How We Survive
content.content:
As you might expect, providing these free services to merchants requires a significant amount of effort, so we survive by monetizing our content. Please be aware that we are compensated for leads or sales generated by clicked links or referrals from our website.

Payments received have no effect on the ratings and reviews for each product or service on our site. Such compensation may influence where and how we present the companies and their products on our website.

Please be aware that listing a company on any page does not imply endorsement. We strive to provide the most useful content and services possible, but in the end, we can only provide the information. It is up to you to determine the best POS solution for your business.

For more information, please refer to our Terms and Conditions.
